text: neohuiga hananim-eul bulsinhanda ha deolado hananim-eun neohuileul pil-yolo haji ani hasina geubun-ui jongdeul-i bulsinham-eun joh-ahasiji aniham-ila neohuiga gamsahandamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eu lo gippeohasidoda jimjinjaga tain-ui jim-eul daesinhal su eobs-eumyeo choehue neo huiga dol-agal gos-eun neohui junim-eulo geuttae geubunkkeseoneun neohuiga haenghaessdeon modeun sasil-eul neohuiege illeo jusi ni geubun-eun ma-eumsog modeun geos-eul algo gyesigi ttaemun-ila
